properties.displayName: _CSGP: LDAP - High Volume of Suspicious Recon Activities
properties.description:
Using Defender for Identity Telemetry,  identify a high volume of sensitive LDAP queries from a single device

Handling Guidance: Determine why LDAP queries are being ran - Is it a Reconnaissance attack? -> Investigate whether the initiating device or account is compromised.

alertDetailsOverride.alertDisplayNameFormat: Defender for Identity: {{CountSuspiciousQueries}} Suspicious LDAP Queries in 1 hr from single host
